featured.text: Lastly, pure olive oil is the cheapest olive oil.
Its ideal material is pure, clean water with high clarity.
A redefinition of the term “olive oil” is also proposed to make a clear distinction between virgin olive oil and pure olive oil.
Strikes one, two, and three were pure bad luck, he thought.

definition.zh_def: 純粹的，未受污染的，無雜質的。
definition.en_def: Not mixed or adulterated with any other substance or material; free from contamination.
definition.example: The water in the mountain spring is pure and refreshing.
